Arpita Opu.name: Arpita Opu
Arpita Opu.about: Hello! I'm Arpita Opu. I'm a self-taught artist and I draw both traditionally and digitally. I love drawing basically anything and everything as long as I enjoy myself drawing it. Though my comfort zone is probably manga art style. Anyways, hope you like my works! Thanks for giving them a look.
